From the CSM Implementation book (Lab 2.03): KPE restricts access to knowledge bases and articles based on products owned by the customer or consumer. Once verified, user criteria are the second level of security being applied, as both work in conjunction.

Procedure

Navigate to All > Customer Service > Flow Designer > Inbound Email Flows.
Select a default flow.
The available flows are:

Create case from email when a user sends a new email
Update a case when you use the reply option

questions.question_text: When working with communication channels, what inbound email flows are available by default? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Create escalation templates An escalation template determines how an escalation request is processed and includes the type of escalation (case or account), an approval list or workflow (if approval is required), and an escalation watch list.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-escalation-management.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.
